ygData.subject: RE: Well balanced weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: good point and yes according to John they do sell for about -5-10% ... From: chlebek@dpt.com [mailto:chlebek@dpt.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:07 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
good point and yes according to John they do sell for about -5-10%

-----Original Message-----
From: chlebek@... [mailto:chlebek@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:07 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Well balanced weapons


From: chlebek@...




Does anyone know if well balanced weapons sell back to vendors for close to
the
sale price like combines do?

For example I bought my combine longsword for 52p 6g and the vendor will buy
it
back for 47p 6g. So if I were to buy a well balanced longsword for around
230pp
would I get close to that when selling IT back?

Thanks,
Taelin

P.S. I know there are better weapons for the money, but if the well balanced
sell for close to buying price then I can "rent" one for a small fee until I
find a deal on one of the better weapons.
